main_definition: In the end, after considering all factors or following a series of events.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the final analysis or as a conclusion.
meanings_and_examples.example: After much debate and consideration, ultimately, they decided to go on vacation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: As a result of all events leading up to it; in the end.
meanings_and_examples.example: The team worked hard for months, and ultimately won the championship.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Regardless of previous actions or circumstances, focusing on final outcome.
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite facing many obstacles along the way, she remained focused on ultimately achieving her goal.

meanings_and_examples.definition: After everything is said and done; when all possibilities have been exhausted.
meanings_and_examples.example: The truth of his intentions became clear in the end, or ultimately.
